Machine Learning Summer School Deadlines

A community project to keep track of deadlines for Machine Learning Summer Schools (MLSS) around the world

This community tool serves as a central repository for deadlines of calls for participation at summer schools in machine learning and other closely related fields.

The dates are made available as countdowns, in local timezones and even as a Google calendar below!

Deadlines are shown in America/New_York time. To view them in conference website timezones, click on them.
Add to Google Calendar Get the iCal Contribute a school on Github

Past Events

awesome-mlss.netlify.app was built and maintained from 2018 onwards by sshkhr. It has been maintained by gmberton since 2023.
This website was inspired (and originally coded) by the fantastic aideadlin.es.
We assume no guarantee for correctness, please correct any mistakes you may find by submitting a pull request.
